name: Duck Life: Space
description: Prepare to go galactic in the biggest Duck Life adventure ever! Train up in running, flying, swimming, climbing, jumping and intelligence so you can race your way across the universe to get back your crown! Explore exotic worlds to find new training mini games and wacky duck aliens to race.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: Dual Core 1.7Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 256 MB available space
